description:
The Gaen Cup final round gets underway, but not without some pre-fight drama! Sophia confronts Tetsuya and presents him with an unexpected offer. Meanwhile, Baku and Kuguru go through some unusual fight prep strategy with the team.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gaen Cup Final Round! Tetsuya`s Choice!
Gaen Cup Kesshou! Tetsuya no Sentaku!!
臥炎カップ決勝! テツヤの選択!!
